Package controller

Class AddAppointmentRecordsController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddAppointmentRecordsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddAppointmentRecordsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that displays the add appointment screen of the application.
Author:
Joseph Veal-Briscoe

    • onAddAppointmentsSaveButton

      void onAddAppointmentsSaveButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Displays confirmation dialog and loads AppointmentRecordsViewController. Text Fields are saved to new appointments and update the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - save button action.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes controller and generates a loop for the start and end combo boxes. LAMBDA EXPRESSION - Creates numbers for the combo boxes to log the appointment time. Reason - Simplify code.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object.
